results.name: a(n) = bigomega(sigma(n)) - bigomega(n), where bigomega (A001222) gives the number of prime factors with multiplicity, and sigma (A000203) gives the sum of divisors.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
xref: Cf. A336356, A336359 (positions of negative terms), A336360 (of nonnegative terms).
